name: EKKA
description:
"You've been here for quite some time. You should look for a way out."

EKKA is a short interactive story about meeting strange people while trying to escape a mysterious facility.

EKKA was created in the Twine 2 engine, mainly as a testing project I decided to upload here.

Thank you for reading this far and checking EKKA out, even if it is a quite small game :).
